name: The Motherblade
detailed_description:
Explore the cursed land of Dolen, where darkness consumed all living, wake up as a Nameless Undead — one who has long forgotten their past. In this Semi-Pixel 2.5D open world RPG, you will explore a decayed, Grim Dark Fantasy world, uncover fragments of lost memories, and battle against horrors born from the abyss.

The world is filled with failed sacrifices, each with their own broken stories, while an unseen force watches your every step. Will you defeat the darkness or become a part of it?

Key Features:

  • Dark Fantasy Open-World – Explore Dolen, a world corrupted by shadows and forgotten truths.

  • Highly Story Focused – Unravel your past and shape your fate through your decisions, 

  • Challenging Combat – Experience intense 3-Directional Combat with Blocking, Parrying and Dodging. Face nightmarish creatures and beings that were once like you.

  • A World of Forgotten Souls – Meet others who tried and failed, each offering a piece of the mystery.

  • A Darkness waiting to be Explored – Dive deeper into the catacombs and dungeons of Dolen with your trustful companion.

    Every death brings you closer to the truth… or further into the abyss.
